0.text: Innate: Pantheon generates a stack of Mortal Will whenever he lands a basic attack  on-hit or casts an ability, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.
0.html: Innate: Pantheon generates a stack of Mortal Will whenever he lands a basic attack on-hit or casts an ability, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a  Recall channel, and respawning.
1.html: Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a Recall channel, and respawning.
markedPassages: Recall

0.text: Active: Pantheon  charges while being  slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's Â range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast within the duration.
0.html: Active: Pantheon charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's  range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast within the duration.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range

1.text: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit,  increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is increased to 105% against  monsters and reduced to 70% against  minions.
1.html: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is increased to 105% against monsters and reduced to 70% against minions.
markedPassages: monsters
minions

2.text: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit and refunding 60% of Comet Spear's Â cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
2.html: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit and refunding 60% of Comet Spear's  cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
markedPassages: cooldown

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds Â half the mana cost.
3.html: If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.

half the mana cost

4.text: Mortal Will: Comet Spear gains 20 â 240 (based on level) (+Â 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.

0.text: Active: Pantheon  leaps to the front of the target enemy's location. If the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and  stuns them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Pantheon leaps to the front of the target enemy's location. If the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and stuns them for 1 second.

stuns

1.text: Mortal Will: Pantheon empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have a cast time and strike the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing 40% â 55% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 120% â 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction and  channels for 1.5 seconds, during which he becomes  invulnerable against non- turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction. He also continually performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds to enemies hit, reduced by 50% against  minions and up to 100% AD total physical damage.

turret
minions

1.text: Active: Pantheon  channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air,  vanishing and becoming  immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon  channels again for 2.2 seconds and grants  sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.
1.html: Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, vanishing and becoming immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon channels again for 2.2 seconds and grants sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.
markedPassages: channels
vanishing
immune to crowd control
channels
sight

2.text: After 0.8 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over 0.2 seconds that deals 40 â 190 (based on  Comet Spear's rank) (+Â 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.
2.html: After 0.8 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over 0.2 seconds that deals 40 â 190 (based on Comet Spear's rank) (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.

3.text: Over the remaining 1.2 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, reduced by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon  reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of  Mortal Will.

Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon  reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of  Mortal Will.

textContent.text: Grand Starfall is put on a Â 30-second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.

textContent.text: Grand Starfall will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

concerningSkills.skillName: grand starfall will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.concerningText: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit,  increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is increased to 105% against  monsters and reduced to 70% against  minions.

Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit,  increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is increased to 105% against  monsters and reduced to 70% against  minions.

Total damage is increased to 105% against  monsters and reduced to 70% against  minions.

2.concerningText: Active: Pantheon  leaps to the front of the target enemy's location. If the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and  stuns them for 1 second.

3.concerningText: Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

4.concerningText: Passive: Pantheon gains Â armor penetration.

Over the remaining 1.2 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, reduced by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon  reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of  Mortal Will.
